description: Alterations and extension to 30 Gloucester Place (including 91 Blandford Street and 112 George Street) comprising amendments to the lightwell terrace area to include the installation of steps and associated handrail, clarification of door position, addition of light fittings and surface mounted conduits to light fittings and external sockets, addition of wall mounted combined sounder/beacons and emergency exit signs; the addition of external light fittings on the north, south, west and east elevations; for amendments to the area of the arcade arches to include variation of the height of window heads, the addition of fixed steel plates, the addition of CCTV cameras, clarification on the design of the emergency key box and for amendments in the area of the south residential entrance to include variation to the location of post chute and intercom panels.
site_name: Dev Site At 19-35 Baker Street, 88-110 George Street, 69-71 Blandford Street And 30
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
LB Ext and Int works to match existing
